name: wyoming

a state in the western US, whose capital city is Cheyenne: Wind energy groups have formed in southeastern Wyoming. The mountains of Wyoming received three and a half feet of snow.
More examplesFewer examplesShe left her home state of Wyoming.Wyoming's higher temperatures cause the glaciers to melt.
